author: sascharodekamp
msg: Feature - "LoginWorker should use expandedEntites von the checkLogin-query" (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-3453) - The parameters in the query String are separated by an &. The Code is more clean (and XHTML strict) when the separator is encoded. Thanks Dimitri for the patch.
I guess that the makeLoginUrl-method in the LoginWorker should return a string with expandedEntites.

author: jaz
msg: more work on the deleteItems flag when calling saveUpdatedCartToOrder; these changes are meant for use in a stateless environment when each change is saved directly to the database rather than grouped together using the ShoppingCart object
